text: The Conjuror's Bird is a 2005 novel by British author Martin Davies which fictionalises the early life of botanist Joseph Banks and the search to find the Mysterious Bird of Ulieta. It was selected for the Richard & Judy Book of the Year in 2006. Category:2005 British novels Category:British historical novels Category:Novels set in Oceania Category:Novels set on islands Category:Novels set in the 18th century Category:French Polynesia in fiction
title: The Conjuror's Bird
